root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 12-5-1, translated into en
root.data: Objective 12. Establish sustainable consumption and production patterns12.5 By 2030, significantly reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse12.5.1. Percentage of biomedical waste treated by 2020, and the maximum by 2025It is the percentage of biomedical waste treated compared to all biomedical wastePercentageRatio of treated biomedical waste to all biomedical waste, expressed as a percentageNot available
